hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. Learn how we protect and handle your personal information.

introduction.title: Commitment to Your Privacy
introduction.content1: At Almare, we respect and protect the privacy of our users, donors, and volunteers. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information in accordance with applicable Chilean legislation, including Law No. 19,628 on Protection of Private Life and its amendments.
introduction.content2: By using our services, website, or interacting with our organization, you accept the practices described in this policy.

identification.title: Identification Data
identification.description: Full name, RUT, address, phone number, and email address.

navigation.title: Navigation Data
navigation.description: Information about your use of the website, cookies, and preferences.

communication.title: Communication Data
communication.description: Messages, inquiries, and communications you send us.

purposes.title: Processing Purposes
purposes.donations: Donation management: Process and administer your financial contributions.
purposes.communication: Communication: Respond to inquiries, send updates about our projects.
purposes.volunteering: Volunteering: Coordinate volunteer activities and maintain contact with volunteers.
purposes.transparency: Transparency: Comply with legal transparency and accountability obligations.
purposes.improvement: Service improvement: Analyze website usage to improve user experience.

security.title: Information Security
security.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:

measures.encryption: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions
measures.access: Restricted access to personal information only to authorized personnel
measures.training: Continuous staff training on data protection

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.description: We retain your personal information only for the time necessary to:

purposes.fulfillment: Fulfill the purposes for which it was collected
purposes.legal: Satisfy legal, accounting, and tax obligations (minimum 6 years)
purposes.disputes: Resolve disputes and enforce our agreements

retention.deletion: After this period, we will proceed with the secure deletion of the information.

access.title: Right of Access
access.description: You can request information about what personal data we have about you.

rectification.title: Right of Rectification
rectification.description: You can request the correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.

cancellation.title: Right of Cancellation
cancellation.description: You can request the deletion of your personal data.

opposition.title: Right of Opposition
opposition.description: You can object to the processing of your data for specific purposes.

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.description: To exercise any of these rights, you can contact us through:
exercise.response: We will respond to your request within 8 business days, in accordance with Chilean legislation.
